title: HOUR 2 - Mike Tomlin, Mayfield, LIV-PGA
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Mike Tomlin, Mayfield, LIV-PGA
description:
Mike Tomlin reminds us why he's a great head coach

Baker Mayfield should be trying to get to Carolina

The LIV Tour is forcing the PGA to treat their golfers better

 

Guest: Jeff Goodman

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
